name: fruitfall (SevenStudios, mrinn)
description:
In this one-button microgame, tap/click/press to drop the fruit from above into a matching basket. You have three lives for making mistakes, but once you run out its game over. How long can you keep going?

By Mrin Mishra and Ian Cowan

made using Kenta Cho's crisp-game-lib for the course CMPM 170 at UCSC
